description: A letter-boxed single-screen version of this dynamic award-winning multiple projection presentation. Produced by the Province of Ontario, for their stand at Expo '67. Up to nine different projectors are used of varying shapes and styles to display the manifold virtues of Ontario's agricultural, mining, manufacturing and maritime industries, before examining the environmental features and recreational possibilities.
